comment._content: Wonderful photo - the yacht seems to be the same No.6 as in this newspaper report (found by quasymody) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=gVwRAAAAIBAJ&sjid=IZYDA... .

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hey Beachcomber I just put this image up of RAWHITI which I am 99% sure is the same image used in the article found by Quasymody. I think you are right in that this image shows the same boat. Our yachts specialist has been notified & I'll let you know his answer!
